::Bodicons::

    "Affirmative, sir!" Decapitron said.

     Decapitron wal=
ked up to Cyclonus.

     "Let's get to work," he said.

    Meanwhile, the=
 other Bodicons were bored.  Maybe Megatron would have a use for their tale=
nts.

    The four of them walked up to Megatron.

     "I'm Headshot, and =
I'm one of the best snipers you'll find!" Headshot introduced himself.

   =
  "And I'm Legtrap, I can design all kinds of traps and devices," Legtrap p=
resented, bowing.

     "Gutclaw here, allow me to show you what your insid=
es look like!  Of course, the enemies are the ones who will get to see thei=
r insides when I'm done ripping their torso!" Gutclaw said.

     "And I'm =
Explobody.  I make explosions.  Explosions are like the sun, they set and r=
ise, provide heat and light, they are dangerous, and they are always, alway=
s, beautiful!" Explobody said.

     "All of us Bodicons can combine to for=
m a super gestalt warrior:Surgital," Headshot explained quickly.

     "I h=
ope we can be of use to you," Gutclaw said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~
